clearCompletedDescription: Completed To-Dos are deleted after 30 days for non-subscribers and 90 days for subscribers.
clearCompletedConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your completed To-Dos?
sureDeleteCompletedTodos: Are you sure you want to delete your completed To-Dos?
lotOfToDos: Tu je prikazanih 30 nazadnje dokončanih opravkov. Starejše lahko vidite preko Podatki > Prikazovalnik podatkov ali Podatki > Izvozi podatke > Uporabniški podatki.
deleteToDosExplanation: S klikom na spodnji gumb bodo vsi vaši končani in arhivirani opravki nepovratno izbrisani, z izjemo opravkov aktivnih izzivov in skupinskih naročnin. Če želite ohraniti zapis o njih, jih prvo izvozite.
addMultipleTip: Tip: To add multiple <%= taskType %>, separate each one using a line break (Shift + Enter) and then press "Enter."
habitsDesc: Navade nimajo rednega urnika. Obkljukate jih lahko večkrat na dan.
checklistText: Razbijte nalogo na manjše zalogaje! Spiski povečajo količino izkušenj in zlata, ki ga dobite za končanje opravka in zmanjšajo škodo nedokončanih dnevnih nalog.
taskAliasPopover: This task alias can be used when integrating with 3rd party integrations. Only dashes, underscores, and alphanumeric characters are supported. The task alias must be unique among all your tasks.
taskAliasPopoverWarning: POZOR: sprememba te vrednosti bo onemogočila delovanje tujih programov in integracij, ki so odvisni od tega vzdevka naloge.
difficultyHelp: Difficulty describes how challenging a Habit, Daily, or To-Do is for you to complete. A higher difficulty results in greater rewards when a Task is completed, but also greater damage when a Daily is missed or a negative Habit is clicked.
attributeAllocationHelp:
Stat allocation is an option that provides methods for Habitica to automatically assign an earned Stat Point to a Stat immediately upon level-up.

You can set your Automatic Allocation method to Task Based in the Stats section of your profile.
dailysDesc: Dnevne naloge se redno ponavljajo. Izberite urnik, ki vam najbolj ustreza!
repeatHelpTitle: Kako pogosto naj se ponavlja ta naloga?
dailyRepeatHelpContent: Rok za to nalogo bo na vsakih X dni. Vrednost X lahko določite spodaj.
weeklyRepeatHelpContent: Rok za to nalogo bo na vsak označen dan. Kliknite na dan v tednu, da ga spremenite v rok (ali nazaj).
todosDesc: Opravke morate opraviti le enkrat. Dodajte jim seznam podnalog in jim povišajte vrednost.
rewardsDesc: Nagrade so odličen način za uporabo programa Habitica in izvedbo vaših nalog. Poskusite jih nekaj dodati!
startDateHelpTitle: S katerim dnem naj se naloga začne?
startDateHelp: Določite rok za to nalogo. Pred tem datumom ne bo delala škode.
streakText: Je opravil <%= count %> 21-dnevnih nizev zaporednih dnevnih nalog
streakSingularText: Je 21 dni zapored opravil dnevno nalogo
perfectText: Completed all active Dailies on <%= count %> days. With this achievement you get a +level/2 buff to all Stats for the next day. Levels greater than 100 don't have any additional effects on buffs.
perfectSingularText: Completed all active Dailies in one day. With this achievement you get a +level/2 buff to all Stats for the next day. Levels greater than 100 don't have any additional effects on buffs.
streakerAchievement: Prislužili ste si dosežek "Nepretrgan niz"! 21-dnevno zaporedje je mejnik za gradnjo navad. Dosežek lahko ponovno zaslužite z vsakim dodatnim nizem 21 zaporednih dni — s to dnevno nalogo ali kako drugo!
fortifyPop: Vse naloge dobijo nevtralno vrednost (rumeno barvo), povrne pa se vam tudi zdravje.
fortifyText: Fortify will return all your tasks, except challenge tasks, to a neutral (yellow) state, as if you'd just added them, and top your Health off to full. This is great if all your red tasks are making the game too hard, or all your blue tasks are making the game too easy. If starting fresh sounds much more motivating, spend the Gems and catch a reprieve!
sureDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
dailiesRestingInInn: Počivate v krčmi! Vaše dnevne naloge se BODO ponastavile vsak dan, a vas NE bodo poškodovale. Če ste ravno sredi dogodivščine, ne boste delali škode ali zbirali predmetov dokler se ne odjavite iz krčme. Še vedno pa vas lahko poškodujejo šefi, če vaši soborci ne bodo opravljali svojih dnevnih nalog.
habitHelp1: Dobre navade so vaša pogosta dejanja. Vsakič ko kliknete na <%= plusIcon %>, vas nagradijo vas z zlatom in izkušnjami.
habitHelp2: Slabe navade so dejanja, katerim se želite izogniti. Vsakič ko kliknete na <%= minusIcon %>, vam odškrtnejo nekaj zdravja.
habitHelp3: Za navdih si poglejte primere navad!
newbieGuild: Več vprašanj? Oglasite se v cehu <%= linkStart %>Habitica Help Guild<%= linkEnd %>!
dailyHelp1: Dnevne naloge se ponavljajo <%= emphasisStart %>vsak dan<%= emphasisEnd %>, ko so na vrsti. Za spremembo urnika kliknite na <%= pencilIcon %>.
dailyHelp2: Če ne opravite aktivnih dnevnih nalog, ob koncu dneva izgubite nekaj zdravja.
dailyHelp3: Dnevne naloge zaradi neizpolnjevanja postajajo <%= emphasisStart %>bolj rdeče<%= emphasisEnd %>, če pa jih opravljate, <%= emphasisStart %>bolj modre<%= emphasisEnd %>. Bolj kot je naloga rdeča, bolj vas bo nagradila ... ali poškodovala.
dailyHelp4: Za spremembo začetka dneva pojdite v <%= linkStart %> Nastavitve > Stran<%= linkEnd %> > Poljuben začetek dneva.
dailyHelp5: Za navdih si poglejte primere dnevnih navad!
toDoHelp1: Opravki so na začetku rumeni in s časom postajajo bolj rdeči (vredni več), dokler jih ne dokončate.
toDoHelp2: Opravki vas nikoli ne poškodujejo! Samo nagrajujejo z zlatom in izkušnjami.
toDoHelp3: Razbitje opravka na seznam manjših opravil ga bo naredilo bolj obvladljivega in povečalo nagrade!
toDoHelp4: Za navdih si poglejte primere opravkov!
rewardHelp1: Nakupljena oprema je spravljena pod <%= linkStart %>Inventar > Oprema<%= linkEnd %>.
rewardHelp2: Equipment affects your Stats (<%= linkStart %>Avatar > Stats<%= linkEnd %>).
rewardHelp3: Med svetovnimi dogodki se bo tukaj pojavila posebna oprema.
rewardHelp4: Kar pogumno z lastnimi nagradami! Za navdih si poglejte nekaj primerov.
taskAliasAlreadyUsed: Task alias already used on another task.
invalidTaskType: Task type must be one of "habit", "daily", "todo", "reward".
invalidTasksType: Task type must be one of "habits", "dailys", "todos", "rewards".
invalidTasksTypeExtra: Task type must be one of "habits", "dailys", "todos", "rewards", "completedTodos".
cantDeleteChallengeTasks: A task belonging to a challenge can't be deleted.
checklistOnlyDailyTodo: Checklists are supported only on Dailies and To-Dos
checklistItemNotFound: No checklist item was found with given id.
tagNotFound: No tag item was found with given id.
tagIdRequired: "tagId" must be a valid UUID corresponding to a tag belonging to the user.
positionRequired: "position" is required and must be a number.
directionUpDown: "direction" is required and must be 'up' or 'down'.
alreadyTagged: The task is already tagged with given tag.
intelligenceExample: Relating to academic or mentally challenging pursuits
perceptionExample: Relating to work or financial tasks
constitutionExample: Relating to health, wellness, and social interaction
taskRequiresApproval: This task must be approved before you can complete it. Approval has already been requested
taskApprovalWasNotRequested: Only a task waiting for approval can be marked as needing more work
repeatTypeHelp: Select "Daily" if you want this task to repeat every day or every third day, etc. Select "Weekly"if you want it to repeat on certain days of the week. If you select "Monthly" or "Yearly", adjust the Start Date to control which day of the month or year the task will be due on.
monthlyRepeatHelpContent: Rok za to nalogo bo na vsakih X mesecev
yearlyRepeatHelpContent: Rok za to nalogo bo na vsakih X let
yesterDailiesTitle: Včeraj ste te dnevne naloge pustili neobkljukane! Želite nekatere obkljukati zdaj?
yesterDailiesOptionTitle: Confirm that this Daily wasn't done before applying damage
yesterDailiesDescription: If this setting is applied, Habitica will ask you if you meant to leave the Daily undone before calculating and applying damage to your avatar. This can protect you against unintentional damage.
repeatDayError: Zagotovite, da je izbran vsaj en dan v tednu.
sessionOutdated: Vaša seja je zastarala. Ponovno osvežite ali sinhronizirajte stran.
errorTemporaryItem: This item is temporary and cannot be pinned.
